com.github.autoscaler.api

Class InstanceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.autoscaler.api.InstanceInfo

  • public class InstanceInfo
extends Object
    Contains information about the instances of a currently running service.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InstanceInfo(int running, int staging, Collection<ServiceHost> hosts)
      Creates a new InstanceInfo with a service shutdown priority of -1.
      InstanceInfo(int running, int staging, Collection<ServiceHost> hosts, int shutdownPriority, int instances)
      Creates a new InstanceInfo.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstanceInfo

        public InstanceInfo(int running,
                    int staging,
                    Collection<ServiceHost> hosts)
        Creates a new InstanceInfo with a service shutdown priority of -1.
        Parameters:
        running - number of instances running
        staging - number of instances in staging
        hosts - hosts running or staging an instance of this application

      • InstanceInfo

        public InstanceInfo(int running,
                    int staging,
                    Collection<ServiceHost> hosts,
                    int shutdownPriority,
                    int instances)
        Creates a new InstanceInfo.
        Parameters:
        running - number of instances running
        staging - number of instances in staging
        hosts - hosts running or staging an instance of this application
        shutdownPriority - the priority of the service, used when making scaling decisions during resource shortages
        instances - The total number of instances registered against the app including all running, staging and waiting

    • Method Detail

      • getInstancesRunning

        public int getInstancesRunning()
        Returns:
        the number of instances of a service that are running and active

      • getInstancesStaging

        public int getInstancesStaging()
        Returns:
        the number of instances of a service that are being prepared to run

      • getTotalRunningAndStageInstances

        public int getTotalRunningAndStageInstances()
        Returns:
        the combination of the number of running instances and those being prepared

      • getHosts

        public Collection<ServiceHost> getHosts()
        Returns:
        the hosts that these instances are running upon

      • getShutdownPriority

        public int getShutdownPriority()
        Returns:
        the priority that these instances have, value may be null if no priority was set

      • getInstances

        public int getInstances()
        Returns:
        the number of instances of this application that are registered against this app in kubernetes, this will include all instances running, staging and waiting.
